actions.text: On agreeing to the Poe amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment to authorize $3 million for FY 2006 and $3 million for FY 2007 to provide emergency aid to the internally displaced people of Burma through the Migration and Refugee Assistance account.
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part B of House Report 109-175 to authorize $3 million for FY 2006 and $3 million for FY 2007 to provide emergency aid to the internally displaced people of Burma through the Migration and Refugee Assistance account.
